title: Loans and extensions of credit to executive
context: ยง412:7-304 Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates. No savings and loan association shall make any loan or extension of credit in violation of section 11 of the Home Owners&rsquo; Loan Act of 1933, as amended, 12 U.S.C. ยง1468.
